decks.notes: This Mono Blue Aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with cheap creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent while controlling the game with counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce. Card draw and selection from cards like Deep Analysis, Thought Scour, and Brainstorm help maintain momentum and find key pieces. The deck aims to lower the opponent's life total as fast as possible through a combination of creature damage and direct damage spells like Deem Inferior, overwhelming them before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on combining sacrifice effects with ways to draw cards and generate mana through artifacts. The goal is to set up a board state where you can sacrifice creatures to trigger effects like Malevolent Rumble, while drawing cards and generating mana to fuel your combo pieces like Sadistic Glee. With cards like Deadly Dispute and Ichor Wellspring, you can continuously sacrifice creatures to gain value and overwhelm your opponent. The deck is designed to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a relentless onslaught of sacrifices and card advantage.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with cheap creatures and buffing them with aura spells to establish a powerful presence on the board. The numerous enchantments in the deck not only boost the creatures' stats but also provide additional effects, making them even more threatening. The mana acceleration from cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth allows for explosive plays to quickly finish off the opponent. Overall, this deck aims to be fast and aggressive, putting pressure on the opponent from the very beginning.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on maintaining board control and disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. The deck aims to efficiently control the battlefield while drawing cards and generating value from cards like Deep Analysis and Brainstorm. By utilizing a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive creatures, this deck aims to outlast opponents and win through incremental advantage gained from card advantage and disruption. Additionally, the deck includes a few finishers like Gurmag Angler and Murmuring Mystic to close out games.

The main idea of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By efficiently using cards like Faithless Looting to dig for threats and removal, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and finish the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The combination of creatures like Sneaky Snacker and Voldaren Epicure with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast creates a fast-paced strategy that can quickly close out games. The deck also includes ways to disrupt the opponent's plans with cards like Demand Answers and Highway Robbery.

The main idea behind this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of efficient creatures and ramp spells in order to deal damage as fast as possible. By utilizing aggressive creatures like Avenging Hunter and Annoyed Altisaur, along with ramp spells like Arbor Elf and Utopia Sprawl, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on and keep the pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of removal spells like Malevolent Rumble and Writhing Chrysalis helps to clear the way for continued attacks, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with Arbor Elf, Utopia Sprawl, and Wild Growth, allowing for early aggressive plays with powerful creatures like Nyxborn Hydra and Avenging Hunter. Malevolent Rumble provides extra removal, while Thermokarst and Mwonvuli Acid-Moss help disrupt your opponent's mana base. Writhing Chrysalis can also provide surprise blockers or removal. Annoyed Altisaur and Boarding Party serve as additional threats to overwhelm your opponent. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control to secure a victory.
